firebase-rollup-tree-shaking.title: Create smaller bundles with Firebase and Rollup
firebase-rollup-tree-shaking.whyRead: Rollup is a special JavaScript bundles that uses ES2015 modules to tree shake uneeded code. Which leads to smaller bundles. Creating smaller bundles means faster page load times. Plus, thereâ€™s some super cool new syntax to learn.
firebase-rollup-tree-shaking.author: David East
